Hi,

www.vipmarathi.com, www.vipmarathi.in, www.songsmarathi.in is provide free downloading our mp3 songs, we haven't provide them any permission, so please remove them as soon as possible.

here is sample link:

About us:

We act for Super Cassettes Industries Ltd. at E-2/16, White House, Ansari 
Road, Darya Ganj, New Delhi - 110002 (our "Client") and have been instructed 
to serve you with the present Takedown Notice under the following 
circumstances: - 

Our Client is the leading music company in India and is the owner of its 
trademark and music label "T-Series", "Saregama" and owns and controls rights in over 
2000 Video and 35,000 Audio titles, comprising of nearly 24,000 hours of 
music. Our Client also acquires copyright in literary, musical and other 
works as well as cinematograph films which it commissions and manages, 
through assignments from authors and other prior owners of copyright in the 
same. Our Client's repertoire comprises the most popular contemporary film 
music in India and the same is highly sought after by consumers and license 
seekers alike. A major portion of our Client's business involves the 
licensing of these rights and our Client is diligent in preventing and 
restraining the unauthorized and unlicensed use of our Client's works by 
third parties. 

 

This email is official notification under Section 512 of the DMCA, and we 
seek removal of the aforementioned infringing material from your search result. We 
request you immediately notify the infringer of this notice and inform them 
of their duty to remove the infringing material immediately, and notify them 
to cease any further posting of infringing material to your search result in the 
future. 


We are providing this notice in good faith and with the reasonable belief 
that the rights our Client owns are being infringed. Under penalty of 
perjury, we certify that the information contained in the notification is 
both true and accurate, and we have the authority to act on behalf of the 
owner of copyright involved. 

We look forward to your prompt response and action. 



Sincerely, 
Arjun Rajvat

New York Bar Reg. No. 4969838 

New Delhi Bar Reg. No. D/666/2007 



Mason & Associates 
S-145, Lower Ground Floor, 
Greater Kailash, Part-I
